p: Loeser et al. evaluated the effect of CasperomeÂ®, an orally bioavailable soy lecithin-based formulation of standardized frankincense extract on various systemic parameters and organ damages that were induced by severe systemic inflammation caused by intraperitoneal administration of lipopolysaccharides (a murine model of sepsis). The study revealed that the extract possesses anti-inflammatory, anti-oxidant, and hepatoprotective effects ( Loeser et al.).
